about_the_game:
Food Book

This Food themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Inspired by food from fast to wild, raw to processed; expect to see everything from burgers and pizzas, to grapes and strawberries!

Contents

The Food book unlocks the following images:
  • Happy Burger - 25x26
  • Avocado - 27x27
  • Mushroom - 27x31
  • Burrito - 31x24
  • Cheese Burger - 32x32
  • Ice Pops - 33x42
  • Pineapple - 35x85
  • Fruit Basket - 48x27
  • Tacos - 48x38
  • Food Truck - 48x44
  • Skewers - 49x31
  • Cake - 50x50
  • Sushi - 51x23
  • Fries - 57x77
  • Pizza - 67x63
  • Buffet - 69x76
  • Grapes - 79x107
  • Donuts - 80x80
  • Eggs - 95x95
  • Strawberry Bush - 124x137

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Food Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
